name: Racing Car
summary: In Racing Car, the player accelerates his car while dodging other vehicles on this great highway, but be careful as some cars may be moving very slowly, or worse, heading towards you. Unfortunately the game has no graphics or interesting gameplay, being a title almost lost in time. Other versions with a different title: Car Racing Free Way Grand Prize Hell Driver It's still not known where the initials R.J.P.G. stand for. The white cartridge version of Racing Car is extremely rare.
